      • changeGViewMapLayout

        public Style changeGViewMapLayout(Style style,
                         GViewMapManager.Layout layout)
        This is used to change the Style layout.
        Parameters:
        style - The style which will have its layout changed.
        layout - The new layout to use.
        Returns:
        A new, shallow copy of the current Style with the specified layout. Specifically, the internal GenomeData and MapStyle objects will be shallow.
